owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.vTokenAmount: Vault tokens amount to burn and redeem

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.ethPerVToken_: New ethPerVToken value for the vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addVaultForRedeem(uint256).notice: Add new vault for redemption. Send total ETH corresponding to the sale of all NFTs after the vault shutdown.

recoverETH(uint256).notice: Allows owner to withdraw ETH from the contract

redeem(uint256,uint256).notice: Burn sender's vTokens by locking in this contract and redeem ETH in exchange

userdoc.notice: Allows users to exchange their vault tokens for ETH, after the vault shutdown.
